name: DashDice Progress Sync
description: Syncs Geometry Dash normal/practice progress to a web server endpoint.

server-url.name: Sync Endpoint
server-url.description: URL to POST progress to (for example, https://dash.motioncore.xyz/api/sync/progress).

api-key.name: API Key
api-key.description: Bearer API key generated by your web dashboard.

request-timeout.name: Request Timeout (s)
request-timeout.description: HTTP timeout in seconds for sync requests.

enable-open-level-bridge.name: Enable Open-Level Bridge
enable-open-level-bridge.description: Allows DashDice website to open a level page in Geometry Dash.

bridge-port.name: Open-Level Bridge Port
bridge-port.description: Localhost port used by website -> game open-level requests.

bridge-allowed-origins.name: Open-Level Allowed Origins
bridge-allowed-origins.description: Comma-separated origins allowed to call the local bridge.
